import React from 'react' import {Container,Col , Row} from 'react-bootstrap' import laptops from '../../images/laptops.png' const DiscountSection = () => { return (
خصم يصل حتي ٣٠٪ علي اجهازه اللاب توب
) } export default DiscountSection
